metadata.title: CVE-2020-7788 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: This affects the package ini before 1.3.6. If an attacker submits a malicious INI file to an application that parses it with ini.parse, they will pollute the prototype on the application. This can be exploited further depending on the context.

criterions.comment: node-ini package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
